    .header-navegacao-color {
      color: #3B9C00;
    }

    .header-navegacao .logo {
      width: 32px;
      height: 24px;
    }

      padding: 0 32px;

        width: 33px;
        height: 25px;

        padding: 0 75px;

    @media (min-width: 1065px) {
      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 145px;  
      }

i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return                                         <div class="arrow center">
                                            <img src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/img/comum/seta_tooltip.png">
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </span>
                            
                                <span class="ge-card-classificacao-resultado tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d">
                                    <div class="ge-tooltip center">
                                        <div class="content content-barra ge-card-classificacao-getooltip-content">
                                            <div class="content-tooltip">
                                                RBC <strong>4</strong> <span class="versus">&times;</span> <strong>1</strong> ALT
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="background"></div>
                                        <div class="arrow center">
                                            <img src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/img/comum/seta_tooltip.png">
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </span>
                            
                        </div>
                        
                    </td>
                </tr>
                
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </div>
    </div>
</section>

<footer class="gui-card-footer">
    <a class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link" href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/futebol/campeonato-acreano/index.html" title="veja a tabela completa">
         veja a tabela completa
    </a>
    <i class="gui-icon gui-color-primary-link gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i>
</footer>

$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-0939dc23-e923-4ccf-8da2-16ab56f26ca2',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-0939dc23-e923-4ccf-8da2-16ab56f26ca2').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-0939dc23-e923-4ccf-8da2-16ab56f26ca2'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("0939dc23-e923-4ccf-8da2-16ab56f26ca2");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/futebol/times/alto-acre/noticia/2017/03/goleiro-do-alto-acre-aguarda-laudo-de-ressonancia-e-cita-origem-de-problema.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Goleiro do Alto Acre aguarda laudo de ressonância e cita origem de problema</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Rafael Maffi passa por exame nesta segunda-feira (27), tem inchaço detectado na cabeça, mas espera laudo para ter diagnóstico preciso. Ele espera jogar nesta quinta</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/futebol/times/humaita/noticia/2017/03/atacante-diego-grafite-do-humaita-e-operado-e-esta-fora-do-acreano.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/vNF2eZbit76yWL9mFWE3FRDz3UU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/diego_grafite_atacante_humaita.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/DPY35GadYuI8o6532eTVHsEZPLM=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/diego_grafite_atacante_humaita.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/zRqUPyQeCvbGBnH3IpsMe1xw4GI=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/diego_grafite_atacante_humaita.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/vNF2eZbit76yWL9mFWE3FRDz3UU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/diego_grafite_atacante_humaita.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">humaitá</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 5 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/futebol/times/humaita/noticia/2017/03/atacante-diego-grafite-do-humaita-e-operado-e-esta-fora-do-acreano.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Atacante Diego Grafite, do Humaitá, é operado e está fora do Acreano</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Jogador tem crise de apêndice nesta segunda-feira (27), e passa por cirurgia em Rio Branco. Técnico Marcelo Altino diz que atleta está bem, mas não joga mais o estadual</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/noticia/2017/03/rf-team-e-campea-da-segunda-edicao-do-open-pedra-team-em-rio-branco.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/StXDIWp6ihJ85YsDW7cFD5Ilkgo=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/28/open_adriano_pedra.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/hc3Se6eZ29A6EgB-eljBDDKMeW8=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/28/open_adriano_pedra.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/kpWnPoGPO0aRKR9ohhgfGq0Plqo=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/28/open_adriano_pedra.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/StXDIWp6ihJ85YsDW7cFD5Ilkgo=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/28/open_adriano_pedra.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">ac</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ac/noticia/2017/03/rf-team-e-campea-da-segunda-edicao-do-open-pedra-team-em-rio-branco.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">RF Team é campeã da segunda edição do Open Pedra Team, em Rio Branco</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Mais de 150 atletas participaram da disputa, no último domingo (26), no ginásio 
do Sesc Bosque.
